name: Turkey's Dinner Party
description:
Created and submitted to the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022

Turkey made a bunch of delicious food, but doesn't know which friends enjoy what food. Serve food to your friends to figure out what they do or don't enjoy. Enjoy a new random puzzle each time you play the game!

Move with WASD or arrow keys. Click with the mouse to pickup food or move your friends.

Seat everyone at a table. Find out who should be paired together and give them their 3 favorite foods.
